introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: I am a FullStack developer, working in the technology field for over 4 years, 2 of which as a developer. Committed to problem-solving and eager for more challenges and professional growth.

content.first_paragraph: Since 2016, at the age of 15, I began my journey in the world of development. However, upon entering the workforce in the help desk support area, I initially thought that programming was not my vocation. It was only later, on my own, that I rediscovered my love for programming, driven by the need to automate daily tasks and create applications that would optimize my team's operations.
content.second_paragraph: Professionally, my journey as a developer began in 2021. I started with task automations, ranging from integrating Google tools, such as Gmail + Google Sheets, to using Arduino to automate manual processes. Over time, I evolved to lead the development of full-fledged applications, solidifying my passion for turning challenges into innovative technological solutions.

experience.title: Have Experience
experience.tooltip: Already used in professional experiences or in more complex personal projects

learning.title: Learning
learning.tooltip: Already used in small personal projects or in exercises for practice

projects.title: Projects
projects.content: Here, you will find frequent updates on my main projects, including personal works that will be used by me, completion of courses, freelance projects, and so on. I will not include smaller projects that were developed solely for practice and will never see a user in real life.
